column17:
Product Description

A Silky cream enriched with Dead Sea Mineral and Vitamins that is immediately absorbed by the skin without leaving a slick oily residue. It develops a protecting film on the skin leaving your hands soft and luxuriously smooth. Helps prevent roughness and cracking while nourishing and protecting your hands and nails. Contains natural UVA and UVB Sunscreen.
